messages.subject: JOB OFFER; BASE ON MUTUAL BENEFIT
messages.body:
BIGLOBE (Inc)   

Dear Sir/Madam,
I am Mr Lee Yarker, managing director of Japan Arts &
Crafts(Biglobe Inc).we are a group 
of business men who deal on Art and Craft and export
into the Canada/America and Europe.

We are searching for representatives who can help us
establish a medium of getting to our 
customers in the Canada/America and Europe as well as
making  payments through you to us.
Please if you are interested in transacting business
with us we will be very glad.

Please contact us for more information.Subject to your
satisfaction you will be given the 
opportunity to negotiate your mode of which we will
pay for your services as our
representative in canada/America and Europe Please if
you are interested forward 
to us your phone number/fax and your full contact
addresses.
Thanks In advance

Managing Director,
Mr.Lee Yarker
(Biglobe Inc).
Please for the sake of confidentiality i would prefare
you to reply me via my private
 email account; lee_y@k.ro
messages.raw:
LEE YARKER

From: "Lee Yarker" <leeyarker@cnaciec.net>
Subject: JOB OFFER; BASE ON MUTUAL BENEFIT
Date: Tue, 23 Aug 2005
BIGLOBE (Inc)

Dear Sir/Madam,
I am Mr Lee Yarker, managing director of Japan Arts & Crafts(Biglobe Inc).we are a group of business men who deal on Art and Craft and export into the Canada/America and Europe.

We are searching for representatives who can help us establish a medium of getting to our customers in the Canada/America and Europe as well as making payments through you to us. Please if you are interested in transacting business with us we will be very glad.

Please contact us for more information.Subject to your satisfaction you will be given the opportunity to negotiate your mode of which we will pay for your services as our representative in canada/America and Europe Please if you are interested forward to us your phone number/fax and your full contact addresses.
Thanks In advance

Managing Director,
Mr.Lee Yarker
(Biglobe Inc).
Please for the sake of confidentiality i would prefare you to reply me via my private email account; lee_y@k.ro

messages.body:
Please provide details so I can know what you are
proposing.
messages.raw:
THE UNKINDLY CONTRIBUTOR

Please provide details so I can know what you are proposing.

messages.subject: Biglobe_Details
messages.body:
Unkindly 
Ref:bg/7  

Our great appreciation and thanks on your candid
consideration to be our Payment 
officer/ Agent to our customers who are already due
and able to pay some of their 
outstanding bills. 
Let me crave your indulgence to introduce our
organisation.,Biglobe Inc. started 
several years ago.It is into the production and sale
of Art/Art work and Crafts. 
visit our website :- 
http://www2.biglobe.ne.jp/~maida/j-art/.  
Your role in this project, is serving as our agent to
get to our customers who buy 
our product and helping in collecting their
outstanding money which they owe to our 
company, you will be given a commission of 10% for any
payment made to you and you 
will be given instruction on how to remitt the balance
funds to us in turn. Please 
be adviced that we will have to begin the
necessary process of approving you as our
agent/partner on our receipt of your 
understanding and your sincere abilities. Upon receipt
of your mail we will inform 
you on the next step to
follow as regards our approval and other Official
processes.   

Meanwhile you can as well forward a detailed
information about your self (i e your 
full name, address ,phone number etc) so that we can
continue with our verification. 
And always use your reference number as you write to
us.   

Get back to us as soon as possible so that we can
fushion you with the next step to 
follow. 
Appreciation.  
Lee Yarker 
Biglobe Inc
messages.raw:
LEE YARKER

Date: Tue, 23 Aug 2005 15:30:07 -0700 (PDT)
From: "Lee Yarker" <lee_y005@yahoo.com>
Subject: Biglobe_Details

Unkindly
Ref:bg/7

Our great appreciation and thanks on your candid consideration to be our Payment officer/ Agent to our customers who are already due and able to pay some of their outstanding bills.
Let me crave your indulgence to introduce our organisation.,Biglobe Inc. started several years ago.It is into the production and sale of Art/Art work and Crafts.
visit our website :-
http://www2.biglobe.ne.jp/~maida/j-art/.
Your role in this project, is serving as our agent to get to our customers who buy our product and helping in collecting their outstanding money which they owe to our company, you will be given a commission of 10% for any payment made to you and you will be given instruction on how to remitt the balance funds to us in turn. Please be adviced that we will have to begin the necessary process of approving you as our agent/partner on our receipt of your understanding and your sincere abilities. Upon receipt of your mail we will inform you on the next step to follow as regards our approval and other Official processes.

Meanwhile you can as well forward a detailed information about your self (i e your full name, address ,phone number etc) so that we can continue with our verification. And always use your reference number as you write to us.

Get back to us as soon as possible so that we can fushion you with the next step to follow.
Appreciation.
Lee Yarker
Biglobe Inc

messages.body:
Mr Yarker,  

I must admit I am confused.  You specifically mailed
me, so I assume you already know
who I am or you would not have mailed me.  Now you are
asking my name?  If you are serious
about using my skills that you already knew about then
this is a nonissue.  

Kind regards
messages.raw:
THE UNKINDLY CONTRIBUTOR

Mr Yarker,

I must admit I am confused. You specifically mailed me, so I assume you already know who I am or you would not have mailed me. Now you are asking my name? If you are serious about using my skills that you already knew about then this is a nonissue.

Kind regards

messages.body:

Thanks for your response.knowing your name only will
not help us in the documentation 
process as our agent.You are to provide us with your
full details.You are to indicate 
your interest by sending to us the following
informations so that a file can be open 
for you:  

Full name: 
Postal Address: 
Tel 
Fax: 
Occupation: 

Once all this informatiopns gets to us we shall be
willing to asign you of a trial payment 
which will define your capability of Representing our
company.Note that we shall be 
willling to offer you 10% of any payments made to us
through you and other benefits 
shall follow after your perfect definition.So get back
to us asap.  

Lee Yarker

messages.subject: sign and get back to us ASAP!!!
messages.body:
Dear Mr Unkindly Contributor,  

Thanks for your prompt response.You are to sign the
AGREEENT FORM and fill the attach 
form to enable us proceed with a trial payment
immediately .This trial payment will 
define your capability of representing us in your
location.You are to sign under your 
name,
and get back to us ASAP!!!  
 Lee Yarker 
(BIGLOBE INC)



AGENCY AGREEMENT   

THIS AGREEMENT is made this  30th  Day of August 2005,
BETWEEN Japan Art & Craft ., BIGLOBE INCOPORATED. , 
Shinjuku NS Building 2-4-1 Nishi-Shinjuku., Tokyo
Japan hereinafter called The Principal of the one
part 
and Unkindly Contributor of REACH Outsource Sales and
Marketing xxxx Washington, DC, USA  
hereinafter called The Agent of the second part.  

WHEREAS 
1. The principal is an organization or organ which
specializes in works of Arts              (Including
import and export of same) based in Japan. 
2. The Agent is the sole Agent to the principal in
respect of business concern afore-mentioned in
paragraph (1) above.  

WHEREBY IT IS AGREED as follows:- 
(a)The Principal has appointed the Agent as sole Agent
represent its business interests in the U.S/ CANADA.
(b)It is the sole responsibility of the Agent to
receive payment claims and customer's indebtedness to
the Principal. 
(c)The Agent shall be entitled to Ten percent (10%) of
proceeds of claims and indebtedness due and payable to
Principal, after payments of the balance sum to a
designated account of the Principal. 
(d)This contract shall span a period of six months
renewable after the expiration of this term by mutual
consent. 
(e)The Principal shall retain the Agent exclusively as
his sole Agent upon expiration of the term referred to
paragraph (d) above and based principally on
satisfaction of the efforts made by the Agent in
receive payment claims and/or distribution and sales
of our art and craft materials.  


							          Lee  Yarker
							..
							         For  Principal.  

           Unkindly Contributor   
	
		AGENT
messages.raw:
LEE YARKER

Date: Tue, 30 Aug 2005 09:24:00 -0700 (PDT)
From: "Lee Yarker" <lee_y005@yahoo.com>
Subject: sign and get back to us ASAP!!!

Dear Mr Unkindly Contributor,

Thanks for your prompt response.You are to sign the AGREEENT FORM and fill the attach form to enable us proceed with a trial payment immediately .This trial payment will define your capability of representing us in your location.You are to sign under your name, and get back to us ASAP!!!

Lee Yarker
(BIGLOBE INC)

text of the agreement - or, as he spells it, agreeent:

AGENCY AGREEMENT

THIS AGREEMENT is made this 30th Day of August 2005, BETWEEN Japan Art & Craft ., BIGLOBE INCOPORATED. , Shinjuku NS Building 2-4-1 Nishi-Shinjuku., Tokyo Japan hereinafter called The Principal of the one part and Unkindly Contributor of REACH Outsource Sales and Marketing xxxx Washington, DC, USA hereinafter called The Agent of the second part.

WHEREAS
1. The principal is an organization or organ which specializes in works of Arts (Including import and export of same) based in Japan.
2. The Agent is the sole Agent to the principal in respect of business concern afore-mentioned in paragraph (1) above.

WHEREBY IT IS AGREED as follows:-
(a)The Principal has appointed the Agent as sole Agent represent its business interests in the U.S/ CANADA. (b)It is the sole responsibility of the Agent to receive payment claims and customer's indebtedness to the Principal.
(c)The Agent shall be entitled to Ten percent (10%) of proceeds of claims and indebtedness due and payable to Principal, after payments of the balance sum to a designated account of the Principal.
(d)This contract shall span a period of six months renewable after the expiration of this term by mutual consent.
(e)The Principal shall retain the Agent exclusively as his sole Agent upon expiration of the term referred to paragraph (d) above and based principally on satisfaction of the efforts made by the Agent in receive payment claims and/or distribution and sales of our art and craft materials.

Lee Yarker .. For Principal.

Unkindly Contributor
AGENT

messages.subject: Biglobe_Endorsement
messages.body:
Unkindly Contributor 
Ref:bg/7,.  

Biglobe Inc Board Of Trustees have endorsed you as a
representative in it's organisation,.BIGLOBE GROUP,a
file has been opened
for you in our Accounting/Marketing department.  

You will be given your first Official task shortly.We
will be placing you on a collection presently and
after this we believe we
can note down your accountability before
placing you on a further assignments.
  
Note that payment is made from any of our
customers,you shall deduct your
commission of 10% and send the balance of 90% to our
organisation's account
via wired transfer or as
otherwise stated. 

Please correspond to this mail upon receipt. 

Thank you 

Lee .Yarker
Biglobe Inc
messages.raw:
LEE YARKER

Date: Fri, 9 Sep 2005 11:51:37 -0700 (PDT)
From: "Lee Yarker" <lee_y005@yahoo.com>
Subject: Biglobe_Endorsement

Unkindly Contributor
Ref:bg/7,.

Biglobe Inc Board Of Trustees have endorsed you as a representative in it's organisation,.BIGLOBE GROUP,a file has been opened for you in our Accounting/Marketing department.

You will be given your first Official task shortly.We will be placing you on a collection presently and after this we believe we can note down your accountability before placing you on a further assignments.

Note that payment is made from any of our customers,you shall deduct your commission of 10% and send the balance of 90% to our organisation's account via wired transfer or as otherwise stated.

Please correspond to this mail upon receipt.

Thank you

Lee .Yarker
Biglobe Inc

messages.subject: Biglobe_payment schedule
messages.body:
Unkindly Contributor
Ref:bg/7,.

As bonified representative/collection agent of this
organisation.,we do
here by notify you of a payment schedule from our
account department which
is due for a payment from an esteemed customer of ours
to the tune of
$46,000.00 over due.
Your obligation for week 1 is the collection of this
amount and we do wish
that you contact this customer onwardly for further
discussion on how this
debt be made to you.Although your full contact has
been forwarded to him
that you are to put a call through to him.
Customer Information:
Customer Name: Mr Sammy Johnson
Phone: 416-854-3650 
Location: Canada
Please contact him accordingly and let us know of any
development so far.We
hope you have been rightly informed.
Great appreciations.,

Mr Lee Yarker

LEE YARKER

messages.body:
Mr Yarker,

Please provide me with:
1.  The invoice for this amount.
2.  The email address for Mr Johnson and mailing
address for him.
3.  The contract that indicates the payment terms (net
45 etc).

Further, I would suggest to you that you provide Mr
Johnson with my address
so he can send a check directly to me, as I have no
relationship with him.
messages.raw:
THE UNKINDLY CONTRIBUTOR

Mr Yarker,

3. The contract that indicates the payment terms (net 45 etc).

Further, I would suggest to you that you provide Mr Johnson with my address so he can send a check directly to me, as I have no relationship with him.

Thank you for the copy of the invoice.  I do not plan
to contact Mr Johnson concerning the receipt of this
invoice 
as it is none of his concern.  He already has all of
the information he needs to send the funds.  I will
let you know when they arrive.

messages.body:
Mr Yarker,

Two things:

1.  I have not heard back from Mr Johnson concerning
his payment, nor have I received any money from him. 
He has the 
information he needs to send the funds but so far I
have received nothing.

2.  I have a car that I am selling to a person in
Japan.  Does Biglobe have a general shipping facility
that handles
third-party transactions?  If so, I could have it
shipped to your facility as I'd rather have Biglobe
handle the 
customs issues than a company I don't know.

Thanks

messages.body:
Mr Yarker,

I have not received anything from Mr Johnson - no
payment of any sort.  He owes $46,000, so I do not
understand
why that is not the amount being sent.

I am very concerned that you have allowed him to send
only part of the money with some sort of promise for a

later payment, since he has failed to deliver on any
promise so far.

I do not think Mr Johnson is a serious man.

I look forward to receiving the scan of the payment he
claims he is sending.  I have not received it yet.

Regards

messages.body:
Mr Lee,

There isn't a transfer slip to scan so I don't know
what you're suggesting.  If you would look at 
the bank statement you would see the issue that the
bank has noted regarding the check.  So there can't
be a transfer slip until the issue is resolved.

Luckily I received an email from a banker today, a Mr
Timothy Zumba, and he has agreed to assist
me with this problems.

I wish you a happy holiday.  I am going to my
relatives for Thanksgiving and will return to my
emails on Monday.

Regards
messages.raw:

messages.body:
That's a good idea, I wish you had suggested it
before.  I can just type out the statement 
from the bank.  Here is the text of the statement:

First there is the header from the bank, with their
name/address and such and my account information.

Then there is a notation of the deposit of the check.

Next to that notation is a little star (*)

And down at the bottom of the statement there is a
footnote with the * that says:


(*) LEE YARKER IS A FUCKING MUGU SMALL SMALL BOY WHO
WILL NEVER EARN A BRIDE PRICE AND WILL DIE PENNILESS
IN A LAGOS GUTTER.

Nwanne, you stupid.

Regards
